subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description: Improve the capacity of the state to overall role of  participatory policy-making, regulation and coordination and in managing pro-poor development policy  and strengthened capacity of local government for planning, poverty reduction and good governance as well as engagement of the private sector and civil society in the planning and development of the state.
subproject.title: Poverty Alleviation-Oriented P
